name: Triniti communications
tag_list: hd-iptv, dsl, voip, cell-phone, mobile, home-security, wifi, telecommunications, communications, technology, internet, web
overview:
Triniti Communications International (TrinitiComm) is a privately-held, global, next-generation, digital communications, entertainment, automation and security company with corporate offices located in Canton, Ohio USA.

Our mission is to provide premium, cutting-edge, digital communications products and services that are of the people and for the people and marketed exclusive through a powerful and entirely unique daily-paying network marketing income opportunity.

We utilize network marketing as the foundation of our business model because of its undeniable effectiveness in introducing our products and services to the world. All motivated and persistent people from all walks of life have a true and equal opportunity to take control of their financial futures as the world continues to embrace and integrate new digital technologies into their everyday lives.

Triniti Communications is changing peoples lives in a most profound way. Our ever-growing network of independent Family Members are working a proven plan to change their lives by introducing our various products and services to customers worldwide and, of course, using these products and services for themselves in exchange for electronic daily income.
